text: Peron entered, a large man, who had once been handsome but was now seedy-looking, a sufferer from stomach-ulcers. In the Back-Face tradition he wore, and kept on indoors, a fifty gallon hat. Harry was prepared for something unpleasant, for this was the Senator who had annoyed the United States by bragging how he had once won would scarcely help bluff to succeed the next time) and, lately, by saying that if Mo land-troops had to come to the aid of the O.G.O. contingent in the Panama region.
handwritten_text: Peron entered, a large man, who had once been handsome but was now seedy-looking, a sufferer from stomach-ulcers. In the Back-Face tradition he wore, and kept on indoors, a fifty gallon hat. Harry was prepared for something unpleasant, for this was the Senator who had annoyed the United States by bragging how he had once won would scarcely help bluff to succeed the next time) and, lately, by saying that if Mo land-troops had to come to the aid of the O.G.O. contingent in the Panama region.
